summary.position: ASSOCIATE SENIOR LECTURER (TENURE TRACK) in AI for SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
summary.research_focus: Using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes and the quality of software artefacts.

responsibilities.research: Conduct research and supervise in software engineering, with a focus on empirical software engineering.
responsibilities.teaching: Deliver lectures, practical elements, and course development at undergraduate and graduate levels in software engineering; supervise degree and project work.
responsibilities.collaboration: Participate in the department's research and educational activities, and apply for external research funding.

employment_terms.proportion_of_research: At least 60% of the employment is guaranteed to be research-focused.
employment_terms.funding_resources: Resources to finance one doctoral student.

collaboration.goals: Contribute to ELLIIT's broader goals in research, postgraduate education, collaboration, and dissemination.

eligibility.degree_requirement: Doctoral degree or equivalent scientific competence.
eligibility.recency_preference: Preference for those awarded a doctoral degree or equivalent competence no more than five years prior to the application deadline.
eligibility.special_considerations: Consideration for those with special reasons such as illness or parental leave.

summary.description: Blekinge Institute of Technology offers a top-ranked research environment in empirical software engineering. Located near the Baltic Sea, the campus provides study programmes in software engineering from undergraduate to postgraduate levels.
